 2013-14522013-12-17,  ,  ,  CH, 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the reappointment by the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada of MARC MAYER of Ottawa, Ontario, as Director of the National Gallery of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of five years, effective January 19, 2014.
